Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done.

links.title: 26 February 2018 - Market Update: Looks Bullish to Me
links.description: Market Update: I've heard a lot of rumblings of the market rolling over after yesterday's move. Although volume could have been better, a lot of other indicators (MACD, Stochs, RSI, breaking through fib retracements) tells me we're moving higher IF we move lower...

links.title: Berkshire Hathaway Post $29 Billion Gain in 2017 From Tax Plan -- Update
links.description: By Nicole Friedman Berkshire Hathaway Inc. said Saturday it posted a $29 billion gain in 2017 related to changes in U.S. tax law, a boost that inflated annual profits for the Omaha conglomerate. New legislation signed last December by President Donald Trump lowered Berkshire's estimate of how much it would have to pay in taxes if it sold the stock investments it currently holds.
